How to get a conference submission under the page limit: 1. Move proofs to the Appendix 2. Change linespacing and use vspace 3. Abstract is “So...” followed by a footnote 4. \usepackage{microdot} 5. Replace “the Internet” with “‘net” 6. Section 7 is a Bitcoin private key
